content.rendered:
Chin Lung

ABOUT

Chin Lung, Bangalore’s oldest community bar since 1960, is known for its pocket-friendly prices, cozy ambiance, and curated menu. As they expand into brewing craft beers, they blend rich history with fresh flavors, offering a welcoming space for anyone to unwind. Whether you’re a long-time patron or visiting for the first time, Chin Lung is where tradition and taste come together.

SCOPE

  • Branding

INDUSTRY

  • Food Industry

CHALLENGES

Sip and Savour

01

Re-Designing a visual identity that scales into a Brewery and Community Bar

02

Creating a scalable brand mascot that resonates with community of Chin Lung

03

Scaling the brand into the luxury community vibe

04

Building a brand identity that is cohesive and has strong recall value

SOLUTION

Crafted For The Neighborhood, Brewed For The World

The Chin Lung logo combines both a logotype and a mascot, perfectly balancing elegance and playfulness to resonate with the target audience. The use of dark blue, golden yellow, and cream adds a touch of sophistication, making the brand feel timeless yet approachable.

Crafted
Deliciousness

IDENTITY

Icon elements are scaled to match the style of the logotype

IMPACT

We Know
How To Crack It

The rebrand of Chin Lung had a significant impact by refreshing its identity while preserving its long-standing legacy. The introduction of a mascot brought a playful and approachable vibe, appealing to a younger demographic, while the curvy font and refined color palette of dark blue, golden yellow, and cream added a sense of luxury. This balance made the brand feel more modern and relevant, attracting both loyal patrons and new customers, as well as positioning Chin Lung for its expansion into the craft brewery space. The updated visual identity enhanced brand recognition and created a stronger emotional connection with its audience.
